TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExpandoObject extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<string, object>>, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<string, object>>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged, class System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider

Public NotInheritable Class ExpandoObject Implements ICollection(Of KeyValuePair(Of String, Object)), IDictionary(Of String, Object), IDynamicMetaObjectProvider, IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of String, Object)), INotifyPropertyChanged

public ref class ExpandoObject sealed : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<System::String ^, System::Object ^>>, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::Object ^>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<System::String ^, System::Object ^>>, System::ComponentModel::INotifyPropertyChanged, System::Dynamic::IDynamicMetaObjectProvider

summary.span: 表示可在运行时动态添加和删除其成员的对象。

span.span: Represents an object whose members can be dynamically added and removed at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ExpandoObject`类使你可以添加和删除其实例的成员在运行时，还可以设置和获取这些成员的值。The `ExpandoObject` class enables you to add and delete members of its instances at run time and also to set and get values of these members. 此类支持动态绑定，这样就可以使用类似的标准语法`sampleObject.sampleMember`而不是像更复杂的语法`sampleObject.GetAttribute("sampleMember")`。This class supports dynamic binding, which enables you to use standard syntax like `sampleObject.sampleMember` instead of more complex syntax like `sampleObject.GetAttribute("sampleMember")`. `ExpandoObject`类实现标准的动态语言运行时 (DLR) 接口，这样您就可以共享的实例`ExpandoObject`支持 DLR 互操作性模型的语言之间的类。The `ExpandoObject` class implements the standard Dynamic Language Runtime (DLR) interface , which enables you to share instances of the `ExpandoObject` class between languages that support the DLR interoperability model. 例如，可以创建的实例`ExpandoObject`类在 C# 中，并将其传递给 IronPython 函数。For example, you can create an instance of the `ExpandoObject` class in C# and then pass it to an IronPython function. 有关详细信息，请参阅[动态语言运行时概述](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-language-runtime-overview.md)并[ExpandoObject 简介](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=169157)C# 经常询问的问题的 Web 站点上。For more information, see [Dynamic Language Runtime Overview](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-language-runtime-overview.md) and [Introducing the ExpandoObject](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=169157) on the C# Frequently Asked Questions Web site. `ExpandoObject`类是使获取、 设置和调用成员的动态对象概念的实现。The `ExpandoObject` class is an implementation of the dynamic object concept that enables getting, setting, and invoking members. 如果你想要定义的具有其自己的动态调度的语义，请使用类型类。If you want to define types that have their own dynamic dispatch semantics, use the class. 如果你想要定义动态对象参与互操作性协议和管理缓存 DLR 快速动态调度，如何创建您自己的实现的接口。If you want to define how dynamic objects participate in the interoperability protocol and manage DLR fast dynamic dispatch caching, create your own implementation of the interface. ## 创建实例Creating an Instance 在 C# 中，以启用后期绑定的实例`ExpandoObject`类，必须使用`dynamic`关键字。In C#, to enable late binding for an instance of the `ExpandoObject` class, you must use the `dynamic` keyword. 有关更多信息，请参见[使用类型 dynamic](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/types/using-type-dynamic.md)。For more information, see [Using Type dynamic](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/types/using-type-dynamic.md). 在 Visual Basic 中，支持通过后期绑定动态操作。In Visual Basic, dynamic operations are supported by late binding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[早期绑定和后期绑定](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ff7f1e-b94f-4205-ab8d-5cfa91758724)。For more information, see [Early and Late Binding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ff7f1e-b94f-4205-ab8d-5cfa91758724). 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例`ExpandoObject`类。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the `ExpandoObject` class. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#1)] ## 添加新成员Adding New Members 可以将属性、 方法和事件添加到的实例`ExpandoObject`类。You can add properties, methods, and events to instances of the `ExpandoObject` class. 下面的代码示例演示如何将新属性添加到的实例`ExpandoObject`类。The following code example demonstrates how to add a new property to an instance of the `ExpandoObject` class. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#2)] 方法表示存储为在需要时可调用的委托的 lambda 表达式。The methods represent lambda expressions that are stored as delegates, which can be invoked when they are needed. 下面的代码示例演示如何添加递增的动态属性的值的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to add a method that increments a value of the dynamic property. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#3)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将事件添加到的实例`ExpandoObject`类。The following code example demonstrates how to add an event to an instance of the `ExpandoObject` class. ```csharp class Program { static void Main(string[] args) { dynamic sampleObject = new ExpandoObject(); // Create a new event and initialize it with null. sampleObject.sampleEvent = null; // Add an event handler. sampleObject.sampleEvent += new EventHandler(SampleHandler); // Raise an event for testing purposes. sampleObject.sampleEvent(sampleObject, new EventArgs()); } // Event handler. static void SampleHandler(object sender, EventArgs e) { Console.WriteLine("SampleHandler for {0} event", sender); } } // This code example produces the following output: // SampleHandler for System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject event. ``` ```vb Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim sampleObject As Object = New ExpandoObject() ' Create a new event and initialize it with null. sampleObject.sampleEvent = Nothing ' Add an event handler. Dim handler As EventHandler = AddressOf SampleHandler sampleObject.sampleEvent = [Delegate].Combine(sampleObject.sampleEvent, handler) ' Raise an event for testing purposes. sampleObject.sampleEvent.Invoke(sampleObject, New EventArgs()) End Sub ' Event handler. Sub SampleHandler(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) Console.WriteLine("SampleHandler for {0} event", sender) End Sub ' This code example produces the following output: ' SampleHandler for System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject event. End Module ``` ## 作为参数传递Passing As a Parameter 可以将传递的实例`ExpandoObject`类作为参数。You can pass instances of the `ExpandoObject` class as parameters. 请注意，将这些实例视为 C# 中的动态对象和在 Visual Basic 中的后期绑定对象。Note that these instances are treated as dynamic objects in C# and late-bound objects in Visual Basic. 这意味着您为对象成员没有 IntelliSense 时调用不存在的成员没有收到编译器错误。This means that you do not have IntelliSense for object members and you do not receive compiler errors when you call non-existent members. 如果调用不存在的成员时，会发生异常。If you call a member that does not exist, an exception occurs. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建并使用一种方法要打印的名称和属性的值。The following code example demonstrates how you can create and use a method to print the names and values of properties. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#4)] ## 枚举和删除成员Enumerating and Deleting Members `ExpandoObject` 类实现 `IDictionary` 接口。The `ExpandoObject` class implements the `IDictionary` interface. 这使枚举的成员添加到实例的`ExpandoObject`类在运行时。This enables enumeration of members added to the instance of the `ExpandoObject` class at run time. 这很有用，如果您不知道在编译时的实例可能拥有哪些成员。This can be useful if you do not know at compile time what members an instance might have. 下面的代码示例演示如何强制转换的实例`ExpandoObject`类来接口和枚举的实例成员。The following code example shows how you can cast an instance of the `ExpandoObject` class to the interface and enumerate the instance's members. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#5)] 在语言中不具有删除成员 （如 C# 和 Visual Basic） 的语法，可以通过隐式强制转换的实例删除成员`ExpandoObject`到`IDictionary`接口，然后删除作为键/值对的成员。In languages that do not have syntax for deleting members (such as C# and Visual Basic), you can delete a member by implicitly casting an instance of the `ExpandoObject` to the `IDictionary` interface and then deleting the member as a key/value pair. 这在下面的示例中显示。This is shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#6)] ## 接收属性更改的通知Receiving Notifications of Property Changes `ExpandoObject`类实现接口，并可以引发事件时添加、 删除或修改成员。The `ExpandoObject` class implements the interface and can raise a event when a member is added, deleted, or modified. 这使`ExpandoObject`类与 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 数据绑定和其他环境需要有关对象内容中的更改通知的集成。This enables `ExpandoObject` class integration with Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) data binding and other environments that require notification about changes in the object content. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建事件处理程序`PropertyChanged`事件。The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the `PropertyChanged` event. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#7)]

summary.span: 可以将该对象封装到另一个 MetaObject 中，以便为单个操作提供自定义行为。

span.span: The object can be encapsulated inside another MetaObject to provide custom behavior for individual actions.
